title: Early Evening
description: Imagine if you had to choose between a blood-thirsty undead walking corpse and a slobbering hairy lupine man-beast for a boyfriend.
altHero: Michael as a werewolf with Kristen
alt1: Michael and Kristen running toward a creepy vampire castle
alt2: Jared, a vampire, upset he can’t see his reflection
alt4: Michael pulls down the drapes to reveal the sun as Jared screams
